meanings.sent1: She is the flirtiest person in our group.
meanings.sent2: The flirtiest girl in school always gets attention.
meanings.sent3: At the party, he was the flirtiest one, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the flirtiest charm, drawing everyone in.
meanings.sent5: The flirtiest smile on her face could brighten anyone's day.

meanings.sent1: She winked flirtiest at him from across the room.
meanings.sent2: He danced flirtiest with all the guests at the wedding.
meanings.sent3: The cat sauntered flirtiest around the room, tail held high.
meanings.sent4: The wind whispered flirtiest through the trees on that romantic evening.
meanings.sent5: The music played flirtiest as they twirled on the dance floor.

meanings.definition: the most flirtatious person or thing
meanings.sent1: She was known as the flirtiest in the office.
meanings.sent2: The flirtiest at the party was the center of attention.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy was the flirtiest, always wagging its tail.
meanings.sent4: The old car in the garage had a reputation as the flirtiest.
meanings.sent5: The flirtiest in the group always knew how to make people smile.
